desc: Permanently deletes an app created through app manifests

token.desc: Authentication token bearing required scopes. Tokens should be passed as an HTTP Authorization header or alternatively, as a POST parameter.

app_id.desc: The ID of the app you want to delete.

app_not_eligible.desc: The specified app is not elgible for this API.

app_not_found.desc: The specified app was not found.

invalid_app_id.desc: The app ID passed in was invalid.

no_permission.desc: User described by the used token does not have proper permissions to take this action.

published_app_only.desc: This action is only permitted for published app IDs.

error.description: Typical error response if invalid app ID used
